Articles.Content: Is there one to get rid of this silly change from 1.0.2, and where is it located?

Don't see an option to delete this, so I'll post my own reply:

Sod Squad's changes and use FAR instead.
...and that didn't help. *Sigh* You guys at Squad are making this game -very- frustrating.

Could you explain a bit more clearly? Pictures or explaining what you mean through a scenario/example would help.

If you mean the firey visual effects (visuals only!), you can open the settings, open the graphics tab, then slide the Aerodynamic FX Quality slider all the way down.

If you mean re-entry heating (the deadly stuff!), then as you're setting up a new game select Difficulty Options, and then slide re-entry heating all the way down.

If you mean re-entry heating for an existing saved game, I'm not sure but you can try to open the debug menu (Alt+F12), hit the Physics tab, then the Thermal Tab, and play around with those settings. Or maybe the Resource tab after opening the debug menu and disabling "Enable heat generation for resource parts. Not sure about this last advice though, these debug menu things are just a guess.
